item.title: These Are the 10 Old Television Series Every Kid Needs to Watch

item.title: Big Investors Await Windfall From Trump’s Argentina Bailout
item.description: The United States finalized a $20 billion lifeline for Argentina that will benefit Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s allies.
